articles.title: Collin Morikawa wins the British Open at Sandwich with flawless final round - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Collin Morikawa has won the 149th British Open at Royal St George's, the 24-year-old American having earned a two-shot win over compatriot Jordan Spieth
articles.content:
Collin Morikawa has produced a flawless final round of 66 to win the 149th British Open Championship at Royal St George's.
 Morikawa, last year's winner of the US PGA, didn't drop a shot and holed f… [+1533 chars]

articles.title: Collin Morikawa is the British Open champion! - The Irish Times
articles.description: American wins second Major while compatriot Jordan Spieth falls two strokes short at Royal St George's.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Disappointment for SA's Oosthuizen as Collin Morikawa wins Open Championship - News24
articles.description: Collin Morikawa won the Open Championship at Royal St. George's as the American became the first player to win two different majors on debut.
articles.content:
Debutant Collin Morikawa held off a charge from Jordan Spieth to win the 149th Open Championship by two shots after a scintillating Sunday's action at Royal St. George's.

articles.author: Ben Husband
articles.title: Collin Morikawa holds off Jordan Spieth to win the Open Championship - The Mirror
articles.description: The American came into the final round one shot off the lead and managed to hold off his compatriot Jordan Spieth to clinch his second major championship victory
articles.content:
Collin Morikawa has won the 149th Open Championship after holding off Jordan Spieth to win by two shots.

articles.title: Covid still killing Americans faster than guns, cars and flu combined - The Star Online
articles.description: NEW YORK: Even with half the U.S. vaccinated, Covid-19 continues to kill people faster than guns, car crashes and influenza combined, according to a review of mortality data.
